This code system http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v2-0569 defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinitionV2 Concept CommentV2 Concept Comment As Published
EOB Print on EOBPrint on EOBInstructs party to print this adjustment on the EOB (Explanation of Benefits) handed to the patientInstructs party to print this adjustment on the EOB (Explanation of Benefits) handed to the patient
PAT Inform PatientInform Patient
PRO Inform ProviderInform Provider

name: AdjustmentAction
title: adjustmentAction
description: Code system of concepts used to specify the action requested of the party that receives an adjustment.  Used in the Adjustment (ADJ) segment in HL7 Version 2.x messaging.
purpose: Underlying Master Code System for V2 table 0569 (Adjustment Action)
copyright: Copyright HL7. Licensed under creative commons public domain

property.description: Version of HL7 in which the code was deprecated

property.valueString: Instructs party to print this adjustment on the EOB (Explanation of Benefits) handed to the patient
Instructs party to print this adjustment on the EOB (Explanation of Benefits) handed to the patient
